title: Kreation Organic Kafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe and juice bar with multiple area locations. Menu features breakfast omelets, cold & hot tapas served with bread, and salads in addition to organic coffee, teas, and selection of juices. Uses mostly local farmers market produce. Prices moderate to slightly more expensive (for dinner).
